He has his own home and has been selling clothing as a mobile vendor for the past nine years. His customers like to buy from him because he takes the clothing to their houses on his motorcycle, visiting different neighborhoods where he lives, as well as neighboring villages. Juan is an enterprising man with a desire to help his family get ahead. He is requesting the loan to buy clothing for men and women, such as blouses, dresses, pants, shirts, shorts,etc. He already has several orders for the holiday season and, with the support of the loan, he hopes to fulfill his financing needs and, at the same time, improve his quality of life a little. He is a good client and this is his fourth loan with Prisma. He wishes to continue working with them. His dream is to improve his business. San Lorenzo-Honduras-October 2014.

loans.use: to buy blouses, dresses, pants, shirts, shorts, etc. for his business.

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.es:
La señora Magdalena de 67 años de edad,  tiene hijos  que dependen de ella, vive  en la comunidad San Lorenzo, Valle al sur de Honduras, tiene casa propia  y se dedica desde hace 21 años  a la venta de tortillas.
Doña Magdalena su venta es de forma ambulante en el mercado de San Lorenzo, también vende en su casa, es una mujer trabajadora y sola que ha luchado toda su vida para crecer a sus hijos.
Doña Magdalena está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de maíz, leña y cal para su negocio y de esta manera mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida. Su sueño es mejorar su casa y tener salud es un cliente muy responsable y es el quinto préstamo que solicita.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Octubre del 2014.
texts.en:
Magdalena is 67 years old, has 8 dependent children, and lives in San Lorenzo in southern Honduras. She has her own home and for 21 years has made tortillas. Magdalena sells her tortillas in the San Lorenzo market as a street vendor; she also sells from her home. She is a hard-working woman and alone she has fought all her life to raise her children.

Magdalena seeks a loan to buy corn, firewood, and lime for her business and in this way increase her income and quality of life. Her dream is to improve her home and have good health. She is a responsible client and this is the 5th loan she seeks.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - October 2014.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood, and lime for her business.

loans.name: Glenda

texts.en:
Glenda, a 46-year-old married mother of two children, works hard to provide for her family. For five years now she has been running a general store in the Philippines; she also earns an income from a restaurant.

Glenda, who has borrowed and repaid six previous loans from NWTF, has requested a new one for PHP 17000 to buy more items to sell such as shampoo, groceries, etc. She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell such as shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Pedro Pablo

texts.es:
Pedro es un vendedor de comidas rápidas que empezó desde 0, con un humilde negocio que con buena administración, acompañamiento y aspiraciones y metas lo ha ido perfeccionado.
Pedro está muy motivado pues cada día ve el progresó de su negocio y hoy quiere solicitar un crédito con el cual ajustara para la compra de una motocicleta para ofrecer sus servicios a domicilio.
Este crédito evidenciara y apoyara el progreso de un hombre de 50 años de edad que encontró en el emprendimiento una forma de vivir.
texts.en: Pedro is a fast food salesman who started from zero with a humble business that with good management, people, and aspirations and goals has improved. Pedro is very motivated because each day he sees the progress of his business and now he wants to request a loan with which he will buy a motorcycle in order to offer home delivery service. This loan will demonstrate and support the progress of a 50-year-old man who found in entrepreneurship a way of living.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle and give home delivery service.

loans.name: Arenas De Villa Group

texts.es: Un grupo conformado por 5 personas  responsables a distintas actividades comerciales  todos ellos residen en el distrito de villa el salvador. Así son las integrantes del grupo comunal. “ARENAS DE VILLA” una de ellas es la Sra. FLORA  de 35 años de edad soltera y con  2 hijos, la Sra. FLORA   se dedica ya hace 2 años a la venta de frutas en un pequeño puesto todos los días, nos cuenta que ha llegado a fidelizar a sus clientes lo cual a generando ingresos  para cubrir los gastos de su casa,  En el futuro le gustaría tener un local propio donde poder vender sus variedades de frutas  y obtener mayores ganancias económicas. Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá  en comprar más  fruta para su respectiva venta  y así poder tener más ingresos.  la Sra. Flora está sentada, se le distingue con una chompa negra , A la vez se despide con un abraso a Kiva y   diciéndoles que cumplirá todas su metas propuestas.
texts.en:
"Arenas de Villa" is a group made up of five people who are involved in different businesses.  They all live in the Villa el Salvador district.  On of the members of the communal bank is Flora.  She is 35 years old, single and has two children.  For the past two years, Flora has worked selling fruit everyday in a small stand.  She tells us that she has been able to build a loyal customer base, which has allowed her to generate an income with which to cover her household expenses.  In the future she would like to have a her own retail space where she can sell her fruit and generate greater revenues.

She will use the loan to purchase more fruit for her business so that she can generate greater earnings.  Flora is seated in the picture and is wearing a black sweater.  She signs off with a hug for Kiva and the promise of reaching her goals.

loans.use: purchase fruits.

loans.name: Rosmira Del Carmen

texts.es:
Rosmira es una sonriente mujer que sabe sacarle el gusto a la vida, criada bajo el seno de una familia humilde aprendió a auto sostenerse a través del emprendimiento donde ofrece su producto de venta de mangos a las afueras de una institución educativa.
Un motivo más para sonreír es  que una entidad micro-financiera la va a poyar y le desembolsara un crédito el cual invertirá en la compra de un nuevo carro para ubicar sus mangos y materia prima que serían mangos. 
Este negocio le ha permitido criar a sus 4 hijos, brindarles estudio, amor de madre y sostenimiento.
Espera con el tiempo seguir sirviendo de apoyo a sus 4 hijos.
texts.en: Rosmira is a smiling woman who knows how to enjoy life. Raised by a humble family, she learned to support herself by selling mangoes outside of a school. Another reason to smile is that a microfinancing institution is going to support her and give her a loan to buy a new car to sell her mangoes and supplies for her mangoes. This business has enabled her to raise 4 children, provide them an education, the love of a mother, and support. She hopes with time to continue working to support her 4 children.

loans.use: to buy a new car to sell her mangos and stock unripe and ripe mangos.

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.es:
Jacinta es una señora emprendedora que apesar de no haberse preparado academicamente a sacado adelante a su familia con mucho esfuerzo y dedicacion, es madre de cinco hijos actualmente viven con ella solamente dos, los otros dos emigraron a los Estados Unidos.

 Jacinta se dedica a la venta de ropa variada desde hace 5 años, vende ropa casa por casa, ademas de esto tiene una pequeña tienda donde ofrece productos de primera necesidad en estas actividades le ayudan sus hijas.

El crédito lo utilizara para comprar blusas, faldas, vestidos, camisas, pantalones, etc ya que en esta epoca es cuando mas logra vender.
 con el préstamo podra aprobechar la oportunidda del negocio que se lo presenta y buscara asi mejores ingresos.
su sueño es poder establecer un negocio formal que sea sostenible garantizando asi el sustento de su familia.
texts.en: Jacinta is an enterprising woman, who despite not having much of an education, has managed to provide for her family thanks to her hard work and dedication. She is the mother of five children, two of whom live with her, as the rest have emigrated the United States. Jacinta has worked as a clothing vendor for the past five years, selling clothing door-to-door. She also has a small convenience store, which her children help her out with. She will use the loan to buy blouses, skirts, dresses, shirts, pants, etc. since this is the best time of the year for sales. The loan will help her to make the most of this business opportunity and will increase her income. Her dream is to be able to set up a formal business that will be self-sustaining and will bring the family a guaranteed income.

loans.use: to buy blouses, skirts, dresses, shirts, pants, etc. to sell during the busy holiday season

loans.name: Ermelinda

texts.en:
This is Ermelinda, 31, resident of Palawan, Philippines. She is married to Roberto, a stevedore, and they have children. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. 

Ermelinda operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store, which retails groceries, toiletries and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a Php5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her store is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a Php 25,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory.

Ermelinda wants to improve her business and she desires to give her family a better and happier life. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.


* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: José Francisco

texts.es:
José de 27 años de edad, es una persona muy conocida en la zona y trabajadora.  Estudio hasta noveno grado, es agricultor  y su esposa también le ayuda con el mantenimiento de su hogar, su hijo  actualmente está estudiando es un niño muy aplicado a la escuela tienen una buena convivencia como familia.

José trabaja en el campo desde muy joven inicio a cultivar la tierra, ya que su papá también se dedica a la agricultura ambos aprendieron muy bien a cultivar las tierras por lo que sus cosechas son muy productivas.

El préstamo que está solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar semilla de maíz, abono, pesticidas, herbicidas, para realizar su cultivo.  

Él planea en un futuro comprar un carro para poder trasladar todo lo necesario para sembrar, sus granos básicos ya que las parcelas donde trabaja le quedan lejos  y  no tienen un fácil acceso.
texts.en:
José is 27 years old.  He is a very well known person and worker in the region.  He attended school until ninth grade, he is a farmer and his wife helps to take care of the home.  His son is currently in school and he is very studious.  The family has a very good home life together.  José has worked as a farmer from a very young age.  He started working the land because his father also worked as a farmer.  Together, they learned how to cultivate the land very well, and now his crops have a very high yield.  

The loan that he is seeking from Credicampo will be used to purchase corn, fertilizer, pesticides and herbicides to plant his crops.  In the future, he plans to purchase a car so that he can transport all of the necessary supplies to grow his basic grains because his plots of land are far away and he does not have an easy way to access them.

loans.use: purchase corn, fertilizer, pesticides, and herbicides to plant his crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables for his business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase rice, beans, and sorghum

loans.name: José Luís

texts.es:
José de 53 años de edad, es un señor muy conocido en el lugar y muy dedicado a su trabajo. Estudio hasta sexto grado, vive con sus hijos y su esposa ambos trabajan para la manutención de su hogar.

 El señor trabaja en la agricultura desde los 14 años, se dedica a la siembra de granos básicos y sabe trabajar muy bien la tierra tiene experiencia en la eliminación de plagas en las cosechas.

El préstamo lo solicito para recolectar y limpiar las cosechas de este año y poder sacarlas al mercado y obtener más ingresos para su hogar.

José menciona que en un futuro, tiene pensado comprar unas vacas de ordeño.
texts.en:
Jose, 53 years old, is well known where he lives and very dedicated to his work.  He studied up to sixth grade, lives with his children and his wife, and they both work in the upkeep of their home.

Jose has worked in agriculture since he was 14 years old, in the cultivation of basic grains, and knows how to work the land very well.  He is very  experienced in the removal of pests from his crops.

He requested a loan to collect and clean this year's crops and bring them to market and obtain better earnings for his home.

Jose mentioned that in the future he is thinking of buying some milking cows.

loans.use: to collect and clean this year's crops and bring them to market and obtain better earnings for his home.

loans.name: Althea

texts.en:
Althea is a 55-year-old married woman from Ajuy, Iloilo. She has three grown-up children. Althea is engaged in tricycle transport business with her husband. For the past 8 years, this business has provided the income that they need.

Now, Althea wants to take out a loan to buy new tricycle. With this, they will be able to transport more passengers thus augmenting their daily earning. 

Althea hopes of making their business profitable and sustainable in the future.

loans.use: to buy new tricycle

loans.name: José Ricardo

texts.es:
José es un joven de 26 años de edad, es una persona muy conocida en la zona y trabajadora,  estudio hasta el sexto grado, él vive con sus padres y es motorista.

José trabaja como motorista maneja un carro que no es propio, además se dedica a la agricultura a sembrar granos básicos es un excelente empleado y desempeña muy bien la agricultura.
 

El  préstamo que está solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar tejas para remodelar su vivienda, ya que actualmente su techo está en malas condiciones y  él quiere darle una vivienda digna a sus padres.

Menciona que en un futuro, tiene planeado comprar un carro ya con el que trabaja actualmente no es propio y él quiere trabajar por su cuenta.
texts.en:
José is a 26-year-old young man. He is well known in the area and very hard-working. He went to school until sixth grade and lives with his parents.

José works as a driver, with a car that he doesn't own himself. He also works in agriculture, sowing basic grains. He is an excellent employee and works very hard in this agricultural job.

The loan he is requesting through Credicampo is to purchase tiles to remodel his house. The roof is currently in bad condition, and he wants to give his parents a house that is worthy of them.

He remarks that in the future, he plans to purchase a car because the one he currently uses in his work is not his own, and he wants to work independently.

loans.use: to purchase tile to remodel his house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sheet metal and to pay for labor costs

loans.name: Fernando Antonio

texts.es: Fernando de 39 años de edad es un hombre muy reconocido en su cantón por su espíritu emprendedor ya que desde hace 12 años se gana  la vida con su pequeño negocio de venta de pupusas, el cual instalo en el mercado municipal. Él es un hombre responsable que vive junto a sus 2 hijas de 18 y 15 años de edad en vivienda propia desde hace mucho tiempo tomando la responsabilidad de ellas, ya que es padre soltero. Todos los ingresos de Fernando provienen de su negocio, es por ello que él desea invertir en su negocio para obtener más y mejores ganancias, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: harina de arroz, frijoles, queso, tomates, chicharrón, aceite, etc. Para la elaboración de las pupusas que distribuye en su negocio.
texts.en:
39-year-old Fernando is well-known in his area for his enterprising spirit. For the past 12 years, he has made a living through his small business located in the city market, where he sells pupusas [stuffed corn tortillas].

He is a responsible man and single father, who has lived for many years with his two daughters, who are 18 and 15, in their family home.

All of Fernando's earnings come from his business, so he wants to invest in it to earn a better income. He is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy rice flour, beans, cheese, tomatoes, pork cracklings, oil, etc. to prepare the pupusas that he sells.

loans.use: to purchase rice flour, beans, cheese, tomatoes, pork cracklings, oil, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her tuition and validation of her title.

loans.name: Abelino

texts.es:
Abelino tiene 63 años de edad, vive en casa alquilada de material rustico, es soltero, no cuenta con ningun hijo en su poder. Abelino vive desde hace 50 años radicando en la zona. Vive en la parte rural de este distrito contando con servicios de agua y luz. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio. Y está ubciada en el distrito de Pomahuaca, provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Abelino dedica a la zapatería, y también a la venta de carne como res, carneros, chivos, etc. Cuenta con más de 45 años dedicandose a este rubro. El destino del crédito será para invertir en compra de animales como carneros, chivos, etc. ya que Abelino desea invertir en este rubro porque cuenta con un amplio corral en donde los podrá criarlos de manera adecuada, para poder cubrir la demanda insatisfecha que existe en su zona además de cumplir con los gustos y preferencias de sus de los pobladores. Para este rubro no hay mayor competencia en la zona y con ello obtiene mejores precios.
texts.en:
Abelino is 63 years old and lives in a rented house made of rustic materials. He has no dependent children. Abelino has been living in the same area for 50 years. He lives in the rural part of a district that has water and electrical services. Most of the people in his community are farmers, raise livestock, or have small shops. He lives in Pomahuaca district, Jaén province, Cajamarca region, in the mountains of northern Peru.

To make a living Abelino works as  cobbler, and he also sells meat such as beef, lamb, goat, etc. He has been working at this activity for more than 45 years. His loan will be used to buy animals such as sheep, goats, etc. He wants to invest in it because he already has a large corral and wants to increase and diversify his stock of animals to satisfy his clients tastes and preferences. In the area, there is no so many people offering products. Therefore, it is a great opportunity to grow the business and provide better prices.

loans.use: to buy animals such as sheep, goats, etc

loans.name: Jhon Jesus

texts.es:
Jhon Jesús tiene 32 años, es conviviente, conocido en el medio por su labor de crianza y venta de cerdos. Vive en casa familiar con conyuge y 02 hijos, de 09 años y 09 meses, hija de 09 años estudia en colegio nacional de la zona; Jhon Jesús es una persona con buenas referencias personales y laborales. Su familia es unida. Vive en una comunidad de clima caluroso dedicada al comercio, a la ganaderia y agricultura, habltada por gente sencilla y amable. Está ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Jhon Jesús se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos, desde hace más de 05 años aproximadamente. Adicionalmente trabaja prestando servicio como mototaxista. Necesita préstamo para invertir en compra de cerdos y alimentos de engorde balanceados para estos, lo que le generará mayores ventas mensuales y le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Jhon Jesús is 32 years old and has a spouse. He is known in his field for his work raising and selling pigs. He lives in the family house with his spouse and their two children, aged 9 years and 9 months old. The 9 year old daughter is studying in the local National College.

Jhon Jesús has good personal and work references. His family is united. He lives in a community with a hot climate where the people work in agriculture, commerce and raise livestock. It is inhabited by simple and friendly people. It is located in the Cayaltí district, in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region on the North Coast of Peru.

Jhon Jesús has been working raising and selling pigs for more than 5 years. Additionally he works as a motorcycle taxi driver. He needs a loan to invest in buying pigs and balanced feed for them. This will generate greater monthly sales and in the short term allow him to increase his revenues and his profits and in the end improve his quality of living and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy pigs and balanced feed for them.

loans.name: Ruth Elizabeth

texts.es:
Ruth Elizabeth vive en casa familiar con madre y hermana mayor. Ella tiene buenas referencias personales y laborales. Su familia unida. Vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganaderia. La misma que está ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Ruth Elizabeth se dedica a la venta de soya en el distrito de Cayalti y también se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales desde hace más de 03 años aproximadamente. El destino del préstamo es para la compra de animales y alimentación balanceada, así como para arreglos de los corrales donde los cría, lo que le permitirá mejor y mayor espacio para el desarrollo correcto y de calidad de dichos animales, lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, dado que sus ventas van a incrementar asi como también van aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ruth Elizabeth lives in the family home with her mother and older sister. She has good personal and work references.  Her family is united.  She lives in a community dedicated to trade, farming and cattle raising.  It is located in the Cayaltí district in Chiclayo province in the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Perú.

Ruth Elizabeth has a business selling soybeans in Cayaltí district and she has also been raising and selling animals for more than approximately three years.

The loan’s purpose is to purchase animals and feed and also to make repairs to the corrals where she breeds them. This will enable her to provide a greater and improved space for the correct, quality development of said animals. This will allow her to improve her income in a short time, given that her sales will increase.  It will also increase her profits and thereby her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to increase her stock of animals and to make repairs on her corrals.

loans.name: Gelyn

texts.en:
Gelyn is 45 years old and married with four children, two of whom are in school. Gelyn works very hard to provide for them.

Gelyn runs a Personal Collection Direct Selling business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock of Personal Collection products for her business.

Gelyn has been in this business for ten years.

In the future Gelyn would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of Personal Collection products for her business

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Gina works hard to support her family.

Gina has a fish vending business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from motorcycle transport. Gina is borrowing PHP 6,000 through NWTF to buy additional fish to sell in her fish vending business.

Gina has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional fish to sell

loans.name: Julio Adan

texts.es:
28, 27, 26, 25, 23, 20, 18, 13, 12, 10, 9 son las edades de los 11 hijos que julio levanto y que mantiene hasta momento gracias a su negocio de cultivo de frutas y verduras el cual heredo de su familia. 
Julio es un hombre de 54 años muy responsables, alegre, que se labora diariamente entre 10 y 12 horas para poder mantener a su numerosa familia. 
Solicita un crédito para la compra de semillas de frijol, abonos y riesgos para tener un nuevo producto que cultivar pues a pesar de su extensa familia, le brinda apoyo y estudio a cada uno de ellos y espera seguir haciéndolo por el resto de su vida.
texts.en:
Julio has 11 children ages 28, 27, 26, 25, 23, 20, 18, 13, 12, 10 and 9. He supports them to this day thanks to his business of growing fruit and vegetables which he inherited from his family.
Julio is a 54 year old very responsible and cheerful. He works between 10 and 12 hours a day to support his large family.
He is requesting for this loan to buy bean seeds, fertilizers and improve irrigation to grow new produce, as even with his extended family, he's been able to provide support and send everybody to school and he hopes to continue doing it for the rest of his life.

loans.use: to buy bean seeds, fertilizers and improve irrigation to support his 11 children

loans.name: Ana Isabel

texts.es: Ana Isabel: Es una joven, alegre, trabajadora. Con el propósito de tener su propia fuente de ingresos, desde hace 2 años estableció su pequeña tienda de vestuario y calzados. Solicita su primer financiamiento para comprar mercadería en Managua: ropa interior, accesorios para mujeres, pantalones, blusas, faldas, sandalias, entre otros productos y venderla a precios accesibles en Puerto Cabezas. Su sueño es tener un negocio próspero y mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Ana Isabel is  young, cheerful, hard working. In order to have her own source of income, she established her small store of clothing and footwear two years ago.  She is requesting her first loan to purchase merchandise in Managua: lingerie, accessories for women, pants, blouses, skirts, sandals, among other products,  and sell them at affordable prices in Puerto Cabezas.  Her dream is to have a thriving business and improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise in Managua: lingerie, accessories for women, pants, blouses, skirts, sandals, among other products

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es: Luis de 30 años de edad es un hombre trabajador que hace 8 años tomo la decisión de instalar una panadería en su hogar, en la cual prepara pan francés, pan dulce y quesadillas de arroz, productos que son distribuidos en su cantón. Él es un hombre muy responsable que habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposa y sus 2 hijas de 11 y 9 años de edad desde hace 7 años. Los productos de Luis son muy reconocidos en su cantón tanto por su sabor como por su precio por lo que ha conseguido tener una muy buena demanda, es por ello que desea ampliar su mercado, y para ello necesita invertir en más materia prima para elaborar los diferentes tipos de pan, para ello solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: harina, azúcar, margarina, leche, huevos, etc.
texts.en:
30-year-old Luis is a hard-working man, who decided 8 years ago to set up a bakery in his home. There he prepares French bread, sweet breads, and rice quesadillas, which are sold throughout his region.

He is a responsible man whose family has owned their own home for 7 years. He and his wife have 2 daughters, who are 11 and 9 years old.

Luis' products are well-known in his region, for their flavor and for their good price, which has given him a very good level of demand.

For this reason, he wants to expand his market. To do this, he needs to invest in more supplies to make the various types of bread. He is requesting a loan through FUSAI to purchase flour, sugar, margarine, milk, eggs, etc.

loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar, margarine, milk, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Julio C. Tello Al Progreso Group

texts.es: El grupo “JULIO C. TELLO AL PROGRESO” es un grupo dedicado al comercio minorista. Zenaida tiene 61 años de edad es soltera con hijos independientes. Ella se dedica hace 14 años a la venta de ropa zapatos para niños y adultos sobre pedidos. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de más ropa y zapatillas de estación verano. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Zenaida es la primera persona sentada del lado derecho viste polo manga tres cuartos de color  crema.
texts.en: The members of the Julio C. Tello Al Progreso group all work in retail. One of the members, Zenaida, is 61 years old, single and has grown-up children. She has been selling clothing and shoes for adults and children for the past 14 years. She will invest the loan in the purchase of clothing and shoes for the summer season. The group is grateful to the KIVA lenders for the loan. Zenaida is the person sitting on the right wearing the three-quarter sleeve beige shirt.

loans.use: to buy shoes and clothing for her business

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
Antonio tiene 57 años de edad, es soltero, vive en casa propia de material rustico por un lapso de 12 años, cuenta con buenas referencias personales y económicas. Vive en la parte rural de su distrito, pero su vivienda cuenta con servicios de agua y luz. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio. Y está ubicada en el distrito de San Felipe, provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Antonio es cultivo de café de variedad Catimor el cual se encuentra en buen estado en etapa de florecimiento, además se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en general contando con una bodega propia ubicada en el caserío de chafan. El destino del crédito será para invertir en abono para su cultivo de café, con ello le generará mayores ingresos y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida. Para este rubro no hay mayor competencia en la zona y con ello obtiene mejores precios.
texts.en: Antonio is 57 years old. He is single and has lived in his own house of rudimentary material for 12 years. He has good personal and financial references. He lives in a rural area of his district, but his house has water and electricity services. His community works mainly in agriculture, animal husbandry and commerce. It is located in the district of San Felipe, province of Jaen, region of Cajamarca, northern Andes of Peru. Antonio works cultivating coffee, of the Catimor sort, which is currently in good state of flourishing. He also sells basic items at his own "bodega" (grocery store), which is located in the village of Chafan. He will use the loan to buy manure for his coffee crops. With this he will generate more income and improve his quality of life. For this type of work there is no competition in the area, and therefore, he gets better prices.

loans.use: to invest in manure for his coffee crops

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
Manuel tiene 46 años, es soltero, sin carga familiar, conocido en el medio, por su labor de crianza y venta de cerdos. Vive en casa familiar con padres y hermano. Padre percibe pensión de jubilación y hermano trabaja en agrícola de la zona. Manuel tiene buenas referencias personales y laborales. De familia unida. Comunidad de clima caluroso dedicada a la agricultura, y ganadería. Ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Manuel se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos, desde hace más de 02 años aproximadamente. Adicionalmente trabaja como peón en agrícola. Necesita préstamo para invertir en compra de alimentos de engorde balanceados para cerdos. Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Manuel 46, is single and has no family responsibilities.  He lives in the family home with his parents and a brother.  His father receives a retirement pension and his brother works in agriculture in the area.  His family is very close.  He lives in the Cayaltí district in the province of Chiclayo in the Lambayeque region on Peru's northern coast, an area with a warm climate where people work in agriculture and ranching.

Manuel is known in the area for his work raising and selling pigs, and he has good personal and work references.  He has earned a living raising and selling pigs for more than about two years.  He also works as an agricultural day laborer.

He needs a loan to buy balanced fattening feed for pigs.  This will allow him to improve his income in the short term, increase his profits, and, as a result, improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy balanced fattening feed for his pigs

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen works hard to support her family. Helen is married and has a buy and sell ready-to-wear business in the Philippines.

Helen requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional clothes, pants and dresses to sell.

Helen has been in this business for five years now.

In the future, Helen would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional clothes, pants and dresses to sell

loans.name: M. Aslam

texts.en:
M. Aslam is 36, married and a father of four children. He owns a fruit and vegetable shop in Lahore. He has been in this business for ten years now, and his business has grown well over the years. He has been able to retain his customers. He buys vegetables from the local market and sells them at reasonable rates from his shop. He makes sure that he sells fresh fruits and vegetables to his customers and keeps his shop clean.
 
As M. Aslam's family is big, so are their expenses, which is why he is unable to save money. He currently wants to buy more vegetables to increase sales, but his savings are not sufficient. He has therefore requested for a loan from BRAC Pakistan to buy more fresh vegetables. 

M. Aslam is positive that this investment will help his business grow.

loans.use: to buy seasonal and fresh vegetables for reselling

loans.name: Santos Cirilo

texts.es:
Santos de 34 años de edad, estudio hasta el noveno grado vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos,  la esposa le ayuda en los quehaceres del hogar mientras sus hijos asisten a la escuela.

Santos se dedica al comercio desde muy joven aprendió el negocio, él se dedica a vender relojes, baterías, radios, etc. Es un señor muy serio con su trabajo. 

El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar más artículos como, relojes, lámparas, baterías, radios, etc. y así incrementar más su negocio para darle una vida mejor a su familia 

menciona que en un futuro, tiene pensado comprar muchos otros artículos y poder darle estudios superiores a sus hijos y ayudar a sus padres.
texts.en:
Santos is 34 years old. He finished 9th grade. He lives with his wife and three children. His wife is the homemaker while the children attend school.
Santos is a business man. He learned this trade when he was very young. Today, he sells watches, batteries, radios, etc. He is very serious about his job.
He is asking for this loan to buy more items such as clocks, lamps, batteries, radios, etc. and thus, increase his business and provide a better life for his family. He also mentioned that in the future, he plans to buy many more items to provide his children with a higher education and also help his parents.

loans.use: to buy items such as clocks, lamps, batteries, radios, etc. and thus, increase his business and provide a better life for his family

loans.name: Walter Alberto

texts.es: Walter de 24 años de edad es un hombre trabajador que se gana la vida como instructor de surf en la playa, además buscando la manera de tener mejores ingresos decidió invertir en tablas de surf para alquilar a las personas que visitan la playa. Él es un hombre que ha sabido ganarse el cariño y la confianza de sus vecinos, ya que desde hace 16 años habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañera de vida y su pequeño hijo de 1 año de edad. Para Walter su familia es lo más importante, por lo que siempre busca darles lo mejor que puede, y al observar que las paredes de su vivienda se encuentran un poco deterioradas ha decidido subir un poco la altura de estas y mejorarlas, para ello solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava y ladrillo para subir la altura y mejorar las paredes de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Twenty-four-year old Walter is a hardworking man that makes a living as a surf instructor at the beach. Additionally, looking for a way to earn more income, he decided to invest in rental surfboards for people that visit the beach. He is a man that has won the love and trust of his neighbors, and for 16 years he has lived in his own home with his partner and their one-year-old son.

Family is the most important thing to Walter. So, he is always looking to give them the best he can. Upon looking at the walls in his house, he discovered a little damage and decided to raise the height of them and improve them. To do this, he is asking for a loan from FUSAI to invest in cement, sand, gravel and bricks to raise and improve the walls in his house.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel and brick to raise and improve the walls in his house.

loans.name: Morogoro Group

texts.en:
Muzney, who is in her late 20s, is married with two children who are still in school. She has been selling different types of food such as cashew nuts, mandazi, samosas and milk. She has been in her business for five years now. She works from 6 am to 12:00 noon daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Muzney's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania Ltd.  She will use this loan to increase her stock of cashew nuts, to buy backing flour for making more mandazi, and cooking oil and vegetables for vegetable samosas. She dreams of opening a hotel.

Muzney will share this loan with her loan group "Morogoro" which consists of eleven members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy backing flour for making more mandazi, and cooking oil and vegetables for vegetable samosas.

loans.name: Elvira Salome

texts.es:
Elvira es una mujer de 44 años de edad, casada, tiene un hijo de 17 años y egresó de la carrera de contabilidad de la universidad.
Ella es inteligente, luchadora, constante, buena madre, atenta y responsable. Su carrera la realizó en la universidad del estado, que se encuantra acreditada a nivel internacional.
Elvira es de tez trigueña, cabello largo rojizo, su lengua materna es el español y conoce el aymará por herencia familiar. Su vida la realiza con su esposo que trabaja como cobrador de una empresa de seguros y su hijo que se encuentra estudiando en la escuela. Su actividad principal es el estudio de su carrera universitaria la cual ya terminó, su esposo se ocupa de los gastos del hogar y ella se ocupa de los quehaceres del hogar. Hace quince años comenzó su carrera pero por motivos familiares no pudo terminarla hasta ahora. Esta es la segunda secuencia de préstamos con la institución en todo el tiempo que duraron sus estudios. Su sueño es establecer su propia oficina de contabilidad y ejercer su profesión. Ella desea realizar los últimos trámites para obtener su título profesional como; gastos de titulación y elaboración de su tesis profesional.
Es por esos motivos que Elvira solicita un préstamo para la finalización de su tesis y los gastos de titulación para ejercer su carrera profesional.
texts.en:
Elvira is 44 years old. She is married and has a 17-year-old son. She graduated college with a degree in Accounting.
She is smart, reliable, a good mother, a fighter, caring and responsible. She attended State College, which is internationally accredited.
Elvira is dark-skinned, she has long, red hair, she speaks Spanish and Aymara, the language spoken by her family. 
Her husband works as an insurance collector and her son goes to school. Her main focus was to finish school, at the same time she was a homemaker, while her husband covered all household expenses. She began her career studies 15 years ago, but due to family matters, she hadn't been able to finish until now. This is her second loan with this organization that she used to cover school expenses. 
Her dream is to open her own Accounting office and develop as a professional. She wants to make the final arrangements to obtain her degree, such as cover the costs of certification and finishing her professional thesis.
For this reason, Elvira is asking for this loan to finish her thesis pay for graduation costs and begin her professional career.

loans.use: to finish her thesis pay for graduation costs and begin her professional career.

loans.name: Maria De La Luz

texts.es:
La señora María de la Luz de 38 años de edad es casada, tiene tres hijos  que dependen de ella ,  vive en San Lorenzo, Valle al Sur de Honduras, tiene casa propia  y se dedica desde hace 12  años  a la venta de golosinas y comidas, sus clientes son los empleados y demás vecinos de su comunidad.
Doña  María de la Luz tiene su puesto de venta en su casa de habitación es una mujer trabajadora y con muchos deseos de salir adelante,  está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de refrescos, pollo, aceites, arroz, tomate, salsa, repollo, papas, plátanos, etc. que son la materia prima que usa para elaborar las golosinas, con el apoyo de este préstamo  pretende mejorar sus ingresos y de esta manera mejorar su calidad de vida.
Su sueño es mejorar su negocio.

San Lorenzo, Honduras -  Octubre del 2014
texts.en:
María de la Luz is 38 years old. She is married and has 3 dependent children. She lives in San Lorenzo, Valle al Sur in Honduras, where she owns her own house, and has worked for 12 years selling sweets and food. Her customers are the workers and other neighbors from her community. María de la Luz's store is located in her home. She is a hard-working woman with a determination to succeed.

She is requesting this loan to purchase soda, chicken, oil, rice, tomatoes, sauces, cabbage, potatoes, bananas, etc. which are the ingredients she uses to make her products. With the support of this loan she intends to increase her income and improve her quality of life. Her dream is to improve her business.

San Lorenzo, Honduras -  October 2014

loans.use: to purchase soda, chicken, oil, rice, tomatoes, sauces, cabbage, potatoes, bananas, etc. for her business

loans.name: Oriana Margarita

texts.es:
Oriana es una mujer separada de su esposo que con ayuda de los conocimientos de su madre aprendió el oficio de confección, tiene dos hijos de 18 y 16 años y siempre ha querido verlos estudiando que tengas oportunidades de ser profesionales y aportantes para su sociedad. 
Oriana a pesar de las dificultades ha sabido sacar su negocio adelante y una de las más calcadas es la falta de una maquina recubridora para mejorar la calidad de confección por lo que pide un ayuda crediticia para comprar dicha máquina que representara un impulso importante en su empresa. 
El mayor impacto que espera tener con la compra de la maquina es la optimización de los tiempos de confección en su empresa y lo podrá lograr si apoyan su proyecto prestando un capital para esta emprendedora mujer que trabaja día tras día por el futuro de sus adolecentes hijos
texts.en:
Oriana is separated from her husband and with the help of her mother's knowledge she learned the skill of dressmaking. She has two children ages 18 and 16 and has always wanted to see them studying and with the opportunities to become professional, contributing members of society. 
Oriana, despite her difficulties, has been able to forward her business and one of the most glaring difficulties is the lack of a coverstitch machine to improve the quality of her dressmaking which is why she is asking for help in the form of a loan to purchase said machine which would represent a big push forward for her company. 
The biggest impact she hopes to have with the purchase of the machine is the optimization of the dressmaking times of her company and she will be able to accomplish this if she is supported through this loan for this entrepreneurial woman who works day by day for the future of her teenage children.

loans.use: to purchase a coverstitch machine

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es:
Sandra es una hermosa mujer de 27 años de edad, madre cabeza de familia de un hijo de 6 años el cual mantiene gracias a la venta de productos sanos, ya que la apuesta a la salud, es una mujer muy organizada que antepone la estética sobre todas las cosas, trabajado todos los días, tiene una vitrina muy ordenada en su casa y hace las veces de vendedora, su trabajo le ha permitido estar cerca de su hijo y generar los recursos para mantenerlo.
Su principal dificultad es haber criado a su hijo solo hacer las veces de padre y madres es muy difícil pero seguirá adelante y lo dará todo por progresar.
Solicita un crédito el cual invertirá en la compra de productos de consumo personal para deportistas como batidos y bebidas, pensado en llegar ha este publico con estrategias de promoción y publicidad.
texts.en: Sandra is a beautiful 27 year old woman. She is the mother, head of the family, of a 6 year old son, whom she supports thanks to the sale of health products, because she supports a healthy life. She is a very organized woman who puts aesthetics above everything, and works every day. She has a very organized window case in her house, which helps her in her sales. Her job has allowed her to be close to her son and generate the resources to support him. Her main difficulty has been to raise her son alone, and to be father and mother at the same time; but, she will keep on moving forward and will do everything to progress. She is requesting a loan to buy personal products for athletes such as shakes and drinks, to whom she plans to reach with marketing and advertisement strategies.

loans.use: to buy products looking to change food habits.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta, 42, is from Dingalan, Aurora. She is married and blessed with one son, Alvin. Even with only one child, Julieta and her husband find it difficult to support him financially because they are low-income. 

Julieta wants to borrow a PHP 200,000 education loan from Kiva lenders to pay for her son's tuition fees. Alvin is earning a B.S. in electrical engineering. Alvin wants to finish college in order to achieve personal success and help his parents out of poverty.

loans.use: to pay her son's tuition fees

loans.name: Blanca Isabel

texts.es: la señora blanca tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de comida desde hace 1 año. es madre de cinco niños,  de estos tres estudian estan en primaria , es una joven muy luchadora y esforzada, trabaja arduamente de lunes a sabado  desde las cinco de la mañana que sale al mercado hacer las compras para las comida que vende al medio día,  termina su jornada de venta tipo cuatro de la tarde, en su puesto de comida  vende carne azada, gallo pinto , pollo azado, tacos. tortas de carne , maduro con queso, tajadas,  de todo un poco, su ventas fuertes son al medio día y en la tarde se pone en otro lugar a terminar la venta si se le queda mercaderia, es una joven muy emprendedora, solicita el financiamiento para comprar mercaderia al por mayor y obtener mejores ganancias y asi realizarle mejoras a su vivienda para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The woman in white has had a small food stand business for one year. She is the mother of five children, three of which are in elementary school. She is an earnest, hardworking young woman that works tirelessly from Monday to Saturday from five in the morning when she goes to the market to purchase supplies for the food that she sells at noon. She ends her work day around four in the afternoon. At her food stand, she sells roast beef, “gallo pinto” (a typical Nicaraguan chicken dish), roast chicken, tacos, beef tortas, “maduro con queso” (plantains with cheese), fried plantains – and a little bit of everything. 

Her strongest sales are at noon, and in the afternoon she sets up in another location to finish her sales if there is leftover food. She is a very entrepreneurial, young woman and she is requesting funding to buy wholesale goods to make more money in order to make improvements to her home and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale grains, ingredients, sauces and oil barrels.

loans.name: Uriel De Jesus

texts.es:
Uriel es un panadero que viene operando en el área desde el año 99, y ha crecido comercialmente en este sector brindándoles una solución alimenticia a sus vecinos en temas de panadería. 
Añadido a la panadería vende productos de la canasta familiar. 
Buscando mejorar su negocio, en un futuro poder brindar un producto nuevo quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de materia prima como harina, mantequilla y los múltiples insumos con los que le da el sabor a sus panes.
Con la ayuda del crédito podrá seguir operando y diversificar su oferta a lso clientes.
texts.en:
Uriel is a baker that has worked in the area since 1999. He has expanded in this sector, providing his neighbors with a solution to their food needs in terms of baked goods.

He adds that the bakery also sells staple household supplies.

Looking to improve his business and hoping to be able to sell a new product in the future, he wants to request a loan to purchase basic supplies such as flour, butter, and the many ingredients that he uses to give his bread flavor.

With the help of the loan, he will be able to continue operating and add variety to the products he offers for sale.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to add variety to his stock

loans.name: Cristobal Segundo

texts.es:
Cristobal es un vendedor de limones ambulante que va por las calles gritando “limones” con un bulto de ellos buscando una venta que le ayude al mantenimiento de su hogar conformado por sus 4 personas, dos hijos  hombres, una mujer y su pareja y por más humilde o rustico que es su trabajo ha podido satisfacer y brindar estudio a sus muchachos. 
Solicita un crédito para la compra de limones en grandes cantidades pues sorprendentemente este hombre cuenta con dos trabajadores y quiere emplear otra persona para cubrir mayor territorio.
Su sueño es mejorar las condiciones de vida, poder tener un local para vender frutas y verduras y que su familia nunca pase necesidades.
texts.en:
Cristobal is a lemon vendor who goes through the streets screaming “limones” by carrying a large bag of them. He is looking for sales that will help him maintain his home which is composed of four more people. Two sons, one daughter, and his wife. And despite the humble and rustic nature of his work, he has been able to provide for them and offer his children schooling. 

Cristobal is requesting a loan to purchase lemons in large quantities, since, surprisingly, this man has two workers and he wants to employ another person to cover more territory.

His dream is to improve the family's conditions of life and to be able to have a store to sell fruit and vegetables, and that his family never lack necessities.

loans.use: to buy lemons to distribute, with his two workers, throughout the barrio, offering them with his famous battle cry "limones."

loans.name: Hernando De Jesus

texts.es:
Hernando de 54 años de edad, se ha ganado el cariño de todos sus vecinos por su amabilidad y buen sentido del humor. 

Ama su familia, la cual es el motor principal para luchar cada día y generar el sustento para sobrevivir. 

Aunque no contaba con recursos para iniciar su negocio, esto no fue impedimento para cumplir su sueño de convertirse en comerciante, con un pequeño capital que le prestó un amigo, este hombre inició con una pequeña tienda de abarrotes, con carteles para promocionar sus productos. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace dos años.

Sus sueños no paran, por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de estanterías para ubicar sus productos y hacerlos más visibles y atractivos a sus clientes. 

Espera poder mejorar su condición económica y poder tener una vejez sin preocupaciones monetarias,  garantizarle a su familia un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Hernando is 54 years old and his kindness and good sense of humor have earned him all of his neighbors' affection. He loves his family, which is his main motivation to strive every day and make a living.

Even though he didn't have the resources to start his own business, this didn't stop him from achieving his dream of becoming a vendor. He borrowed a small amount of capital from a friend and opened a small grocery store. He put up signs to promote his products. He has been in business for two years.

His dream doesn't stop there, which is why he is requesting a loan to invest in purchasing shelves to display his products. This will make them more visible and attractive to his customers.

He hopes to be able to improve his financial situation so that he doesn't have financial worries in his old age. He also wants to secure a better future for his family.

loans.use: to buy shelves for his products.

loans.name: Ana

texts.en:
Ana is 54 years old and married. She has four children. She works very hard to provide for them, running a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for six years.

Ana has requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF. She will use the loan to buy additional stock to sell, like canned goods, eggs, milk, soap, etc.

In the future Ana would like to build and expand her business, to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stock for her store, like canned goods, eggs, and milk

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es: Fernando: Es un hombre luchador, casado, tiene 9 hijos mayores de edad. Desde hace 4 años vive en una casa minifalda de concreto y madera. Con el propósito de terminar de construir su vivienda, solicita financiamiento para comprar materiales; madera, clavo, zinc, cemento y cubrir costos de mano de obra. Su sueño es establecer una pulpería.
texts.en:
Fernando is a hard-working man, who is married and has 9 adult children. For the past four years, he has lived in a house made of a mix of concrete and wood.

Wanting to finish the construction of his house, he is requesting a loan to purchase supplies: wood, nails, zinc, and cement, and to pay the cost of labor. His dream is to start a small grocery store.

loans.use: to purchase wood, nails, zinc, and cementpara and to pay for labor

loans.name: Rowen

texts.en: Rowena is from Cauayan City, Isabela, Philippines. She is married and has been blessed with three children. She manages a sari-sari store, while her husband is a driver. Their income is sometimes insufficient for their expenses. That’s why she wants to seek PHP 200,000 in financial assistance from the KIVA lenders, to pay the tuition fee of her son, Charles John. Charles is taking up study toward a B.S. in Marine Transportation. He wants to finish college, to help his family out of poverty and for the betterment of their future.

loans.use: to pay her son's tuition fee, so he can pursue a B.S. in Marine Transportation.

loans.name: Rucille

texts.en: Rucille is a hard-working mother, who owns and manages a small retail store within the local community. She is 53 years old and has been blessed with three children. She aspires to further improve her business, to earn sufficient income and provide the necessities for her family. Due to insufficient capital, she would like to access financial assistance from Kiva lenders, amounting to PHP 15,000. She will use the loan to buy more inventory to resell, including grocery items, rice, and LPG tanks. Through this financial assistance, Rucille believes that she will be able to make her business grow.

loans.use: to buy more inventory, including groceries, rice, and LPG tanks

location.town: Brgy. Mabasa, Dupax del Norte, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Janice

texts.en:
Janice, a married woman, works hard to support her family. She has a fishing and fish vending business, in the Philippines. She has been in this business for three years.

She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF. She will use this amount to buy additional fishing net. She would like to save enough, to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing net

loans.name: Metrine

texts.en:
Hello, lenders! The above picture presents Metrine, a mother of four who has been practicing agriculture for the last 10 years. Because of the immense knowledge she has about farming, she commands a lot of respect among other farmers and she is viewed as a mentor in her village. She lives together with her children in the Kitale area of Kenya, which is known for maize plantations for export. Metrine's primary income sources are eggs, milk, and some personal business she engages in to supplement her meager income. Generating an income through selling her harvest is the part of farming she enjoys most. She also keeps a dairy cow. Availability of labor is a major challenge for Metrine.

Before joining Juhudi, Metrine could not access loans from banks since they considered her a high risk client. She mobilized marginalized farmers and created the group Excel Senior. Through the group, she joined Juhudi Kilimo and learned about loan management and agribusiness. She also got to learn about Kiva. Metrine is seeking a loan to purchase farm implements. With your loan, Metrine will purchase more effective modern tools that will make her farm activities much easier. This will boost her income and enable her to pay school fees for her children. Metrine waits for your kindness.

loans.use: To buy farm implements

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a freezer and ingredients for her preparations such as flour

loans.name: Miladis

texts.es: Miladis, es habitante de un barrio ubicado en el municipio de Barranquilla,  tiene  47 años de edad y es madre de cuatro hijos, tres jóvenes de 29, 28 y 27 años  y  su hija menor de 26 años. Su idea de negocio inició cuando ella le manifestó  a uno de sus hijos, trabajador  en una empresa de telecomunicaciones su deseo de tener un negocio; fue así como con un préstamo que su hijo solicitó, compraron 3 equipos de cómputo y celulares con lo que dieron  inicio a este emprendimiento.  Poco a poco, fueron incluyendo otros artículos y servicios, que se podían comercializar en este formato de negocio, como golosinas, refrescos, accesorios y equipos de celular, servicio de fotocopiadora y transcripción de documentos, incluso prendas de vestir, maquillajes y perfumes. Este negocio ha funcionado desde el año 2012 y se encuentra situado en su vivienda; ella trabaja con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación,  presta servicios en el horario  de 6 a.m. a 10 p.m.,  completando una jornada de 16 horas diarias, de lunes a domingo.  Sin embargo aunque su jornada laborar es extensa, su meta es tener otro negocio y brindar servicios de play statión y  a nivel familiar desea construir la segunda planta de su casa, con el fin de independizar  su vida laboral de su vivienda y mejorar su calidad de vida.  Miladis está aplicando a un crédito con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para ampliar la capacidad de su negocio, el cual invertirá en la compra de dos computadores, teléfono inalámbrico y demás productos que ella comercializa, esto debido a la gran demanda de clientes y amplios horarios de atención.  Este negocio tiene una buena recuperación de las inversiones que se hacen en él, puesto que las ventas se realizan de contado y  también ofrece  crédito con sus clientes. Sus principales proveedores son las distribuidoras y los almacenes a quienes les han brindado la oportunidad de comprar a crédito o contado.
texts.en:
Miladis is a resident of a neighborhood located in the municipality of Barranquilla.  She is 47 years old and the mother of four children: three young men, ages 29, 28, and 27, and her youngest daughter, age 26.  

Her idea for a business began when she expressed to one of her sons, a worker in a telecommunications business, her desire to have a business.  So with a loan solicited by her son, they bought 3 computer systems and cellular phones, with which they began this enterprise.  Little by little, they started including other items and services that could be sold in this business format, such as sweets, soft drinks, cellphone accessories and equipment, photocopying and document transcription services, and even clothing items, makeup, and perfume.  

This business has been operating since 2012 and it is located in her house.  She works with a lot of effort and dedication.  She offers services from 6 a.m. to 10 p.m., completing a 16-hour work day, from Monday to Sunday.  However, although her work day is long, her goal is to have another business and offer Play Station services.  On a family level, she wants to build a second floor on her house, in order to make her work life independent from her home and improve her quality of life.  

Miladis is applying for a loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to expand the capacity of her business.  She will invest it in the purchase of two computers, a wireless telephone, and the other products which she sells, due to the large demand from clients and the extensive service schedule.  This business has a good recovery of the investments she makes in it, since the sales are made in cash, and she also offers credit to her clients.  Her primary providers are the distributors or the storehouses that have given them the opportunity to buy on credit or in cash.

loans.use: to buy computers, a wireless telephone, clothing items, makeup, and perfume.

loans.name: Albeiro De Jesus

texts.es:
Albeiro es un campesino, humilde y trabajador con el empuje y verraquera que distingue a los hombres y mujeres del campo.

Es un Hombre de mente emprendedora y desde muy pequeño aprendió todos los oficios del campo como cultivos y crianza de animales, tanto así que hoy en día tiene su propio cultivo de papa y lechuga; alimentos que vende en la plaza de mercado.

Este personaje tiene como propósito aumentar sus cultivos y mejorar los que actualmente tiene y es por eso que acude a la ayuda de un crédito para la compra de insumos agropecuarios como fertilizantes y la compra de semillas de papa.

El préstamo le dará la oportunidad de progresar como empresario y como persona, además de aumentar sus ingresos y seguir aportando el sustento en su hogar.

Él lo único que quiere es poder mejorar la calidad de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
Albeiro is a modest and hardworking farm-worker with the drive and tenacity that characterizes rural men and women.

He's a man with an enterprising mind who from a very young age learned all the farm tasks, such as growing crops and raising animals--so much so that now he has his own potato and lettuce crops.  He sells this food on the plaza of the town market.

Albeiro's goal is to increase his crops and improve the ones he currently has.  That's why he's requesting the help of a loan to buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizer as well as potato seeds.

The loan will give Albeiro the chance to progress as an entrepreneur and as a person, as well as to increase his income and keep on supporting his household.

The only thing Albeiro wants is to be able to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds as well as agricultural inputs such as fertilizer

loans.name: Monica Alexandra

texts.es:
Monica es una bella mujer de 27 años de edad, criada con unos excelentes valores, desde el colegio desarrollo una gran pasión por todo lo relacionado con la belleza  y desde que salió comenzó a realizar cursos en cepillado, arreglo de uñas, entre otros.

Inicio su etapa productiva en salones de belleza del municipio de Medellín, hasta que un día se aventuró y decidió ir en busca de su propia clientela montando un negocio de salón de belleza en un pequeño local. 

Solicita un crédito para la compra de surtido pues también quiere vender productos para complementar sus servicios, como crema de manos, gel, productos capilares, tinturas para cabello, barnices y comprar una silla masajeadora.

El crédito para ella será muy importante pues terminara de consolidar su empresa completándola con todos los insumos necesarios para operar y ofrecer cualquier servicio que lleguen a solicitarle.

Su sueño es que su empresa progrese y tenga muchos clientes ya que será determinante para su futuro
texts.en:
Monica is a beautiful 27-year-old woman.She was raised with excellent values.

In high school she developed a big passion for everything related to beauty; after that, she started taking courses on hair care, nail care, and other topics.  She started working in beauty salons in the city of Medellín.  One day she took a risk and decided to look for her own customers and set up a beauty salon in a small retail space.

She's requesting a loan to buy supplies, because she also wants to sell products that are complementary to her services such as hand lotion, gel, hair products, hair dye, and nail polish.  She also wants to buy a massage chair.

The loan will be very important for her because she'll finish strengthening her business, filling it out with all the supplies necessary to operate and offering any service that might be requested of her.

Her dream is for her business to progress and to have a lot of customers, which will be decisive for her future.

loans.use: to buy hand cream, gel, hair products, and hair dye

loans.name: Verónica Yasmin

texts.es:
Verónica de 24 años de edad, es muy conocida en el lugar y muy trabajadora, estudio hasta bachillerato y se dedica a los oficios domésticos,  vive con su hijo tienen casa propia de ladrillo. Junto a su esposo trabajan para mantener el hogar y ayudar a sus papas.

Verónica se dedica a vender tortillas y pupusas ella es una excelente trabajadora se desenvuelve muy bien en el área del comercio y desempeña bien sus labores diarias.


El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar maíz, cal, leña, chicharro, quesillo, aceite, etc. para elaborar las tortillas y pupusas.  

tiene planeado comprar un carro para poder movilizarse más fácilmente, esto lo realizara con la ayuda de crédito que solicitara.
texts.en:
Veronica is 24 years old. She is well known and hardworking. She finished high school and does house work. She lives with her son and owns a brick home. She and her husband work hard to support their home and also help her parents.
Veronica sells tortillas and pupusas. She is an excellent worker and knows this field well. She works hard every day.
She is asking for this loan to buy corn, lime, wood, mackerel, cottage cheese, oil, etc. to make tortillas and pupusas.
Her goal is to buy a car to get around more easily, so, she hopes to use another loan to do so.

loans.use: to buy corn, lime, wood, mackerel, cottage cheese, oil, etc. to make tortillas and pupusas.

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es:
Ana de 28 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato general, está casada y su esposo es comerciante de fruta y verduras, tiene 4 hijos que estudia  2° grado y kínder y las gemelas aun no, con su pareja son los responsables de mantener a sus hijos y nadie más vive con ellos.

La señora tiene una tienda en su casa desde hace 7 años, aprendió por iniciativa, antes trabajaba de vendedora en una ferretería, el horario de su tienda es de 6 am a 9 pm y le ayuda su esposo cuando viene de su trabajo. 

El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar granos básicos, jabón, aceite, saco de papas, mejorara su negocio pues tendrá más ingresos porque venderá más. 

El sueño para el negocio es hacerlo más grande y en un futuro poner una venta de pupusas, para su familia es que sus hijos crezcan sanamente y que continúen estudiando.
texts.en:
Ana is 28 years old, studied up to high school, is married and her husband is a fruit and vegetable merchant.  She has 4 children,  one in 2nd grade, and one in kindergarten and the twins are not in school yet.  Along with her partner, they are responsible for the upbringing of their children and no one else lives with them.

Ana has had a general store at her home for 7 years, through her own initiative.  She previously worked as a saleswoman at a hardware store.  Her store hours are 6 am to 9 pm and her husband helps when he comes home from his work.

The loan that she is requesting is to buy basic grains, soap, oil, sack of potatoes.  This will improve her business and create more revenue because she will sell more. 

The dream for the business is to make it bigger and in the future set up a pupusa [stuffed tortillas] stand,  and for her family, is that her children grow up healthy and continue studying.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, soap, oil, sack of potatoes.  This will improve her business and create more revenue because she will sell more.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, crab nets and other tools

loans.name: Rosselin

texts.en:
Rosselin is 33 years old and has four children.  She is married and three of her children are in school. Rosselin is in the agricultural business of farming bananas and vegetables in the Philippines. She has been farming bananas and vegetables for seven years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

Rosselin requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase fertilizers and vegetables. In the future, she would like to save enough money that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and vegetables

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 55 years old and has six children. She is married and one of her children is in school. Josephine is in the business of farming vegetables in the Philippines. She has been farming vegetables for 35 years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

Josephine requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to purchase fertilizers and seeds. In the future, Josephine would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seeds

loans.name: Miltón Balmore

texts.es:
Milton de 28 años de edad, estudio hasta el bachillerato.  Actualmente vive con su esposa y sus hijos.  Se dedica a trabajar la tierra, su esposa es ama de casa y también ayuda con los quehaceres del hogar y trabajan con sus padres. 

El préstamo que está solicitando, es para pagar mano de obra que le ayude a sacar la cosecha de maíz. Así poder brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

Planea construir una vivienda y también poder ayudar a su padre en la siembra del maíz en el próximo año.
texts.en:
Miltón is 28 years old and attended school through middle school. He lives with his wife and their children. He farms for a living; his wife is a stay-at-home mom and also helps with the household chores. They work with his parents.

He is requesting a loan to pay for the labor that he needs to help harvest corn. In this way, he will be able to provide his family a better quality of life.

He plans to build a house and also be able to help his father sow corn next year.

loans.use: to pay for the labor needed to help harvest his corn

loans.name: Mary Grace

texts.en:
Mary Grace is 34 years old and married. She has six children, and four of her children are in school. Mary Grace works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for one year and sells a variety of items, such as canned goods, eggs, soy sauce, tomato paste, and soap.

She has requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF. She will use the loan to purchase additional items to sell, like canned goods, beverages, and other groceries.

In the future, Mary Grace would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional goods to sell at her store, like canned goods, beverages, and other groceries

loans.name: Over Xavier

texts.es:
Over es padre de 1 hijo de 11 años. Aparte a su familia, se dedica a la  agricultura desde hace 10 años. 

Aprendió este negocio empíricamente, es decir a través de observación de otras personas. 

El y su familia viven una zona rural de Colombia en la cual no es fácil tener acceso a servicios financieros como los que aporta Interactuar. 

Su crédito lo va usar para comprar insumos agropecuarios como semillas, productos para el control de plagas, y abonos para poder preparar sus cultivos. 

Gracias a este crédito, la economía de su familia y la calidad de vida mejorarían pues pudiera aumentar sus ingresos. 

Over sueña con enseñar a su hijo del negocio y poder brindarle un buen sostenimiento. 

¡Impacte la vida de Over y su familia con un crédito!
texts.en: Over is the father of an 11 year old son. Besides taking care of his family, he has worked in agriculture for ten years. He learned this business empirically, that is by observing other people. He and his family live in a rural area of Colombia, where there is no easy access to financial services as those offered by Interactuar. He will use his loan to buy agricultural inputs such as seeds, products for plague control and manure in order to be able to prepare his crops. Thanks to this loan, his family's finances and the quality of life will improve because he will increase his income. Over dreams to teach his son and be able to provide subsistence to him. Make a change in Over's life and his family with a loan!

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs such as seeds, products for plague control.

loans.name: Jose Guillermo

texts.es:
José trabaja con una  ebanistería, es padre de 2 hijos ya mayores de edad y a sus 58 años de edad se siente muy feliz trabajando su propia empresa la cual un amigo le enseño todo de la profesión hace ya varios años.
Es bueno ver como una persona le pone tanto a mor a su negocio y a pesar de los problemas económicos sigue en pie con lo que le gusta hacer. 
Quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de madera, con lo que podrá arreglar muebles o fabricar para la venta, o atender pedidos específicos.
Con este impulso que está recibiendo de la corporación interactuar espera poder diversificar su oferta, ser más competitivo, tener sostenibilidad en su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida, metas y suelos que con trabajo espera cumplir.
texts.en:
Jose does woodworking. He is the father of 2 grown children and, at the age of 58, he is very happy working in this profession, that he learned from a friend several years ago.
It's wonderful to see someone put so much love in his business despite economic problems, just because he enjoys doing what he does.
He is asking for this loan to buy wood to repair furniture, manufacture items for sale, or fulfill specific requests.
With the support he is getting from this organization, he hopes to diversify the items he is offering, to become more competitive and to create a more sustainable business to improve his quality of life reach his goals and dreams, that he hopes to fulfill with hard work.

loans.use: to buy wood so to repair furniture, manufacture items for sale, or fulfill specific requests.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 55 years old and has four children, two of whom are in school. She earns a living by raising poultry, in the Philippines. She has been raising poultry for 15 years, and she earns additional income from selling charcoal.

Josephine is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF. She will use this amount to buy feed and vitamins for her chickens.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her chickens

loans.name: M. Zahid

texts.en:
M. Zahid, 30, is married and the father of a son. He lives in Lahore. M. Zahid is young and enthusiastic. He runs a hardware shop in a nearby community, where he sells hardware, tools, and equipment. He opened up this shop two years ago and his business has been growing. M. Zahid is happy with the progress of the business, but he wants his business to grow more. 

M. Zahid wants to increase his sales and make more variety and types of hardware available to his customers. As it has been just two years since he began running the business, he has not been able to save. He has therefore requested a loan from BRAC Pakistan. M. Zahid wants his son to get a higher education and is hopeful for the success of his business.

loans.use: To buy various hardware for reselling.

loans.name: Kasese Traders Choice Group

texts.en:
Paschal is a member of Kasese Traders Choice group. Paschal is a thirty-five-year-old man, married, and father of six children. He lives in Kasese, Uganda. Paschal operates a retail shop selling general merchandise, and he also practices farming, growing crops such as coffee, rice, cotton, and others, to get additional income. He has been in that business for nine years.

Paschal has a dream of expanding his business. However, he is faced with poor seasons and low customer turn-out during the rainy season. Paschal wants money to buy sugar, salt, sodas, maize flour, and other general merchandise for selling.

loans.use: to buy goods to sell, like salt, sodas, maize flour, and other general merchandise

loans.name: Michelle

texts.en:
Michelle is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Michelle is 50 years old and both of her children are in school. She has a rice retailing business in the Philippines and she has been in this business for one year. 

Michelle requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell. In the future, she would like to save enough money that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en: Due to financial hardship, Lourdes wants to make her business more profitable and earn a higher income. This would help her to support the education of her two children and satisfy their daily needs. She aspires to acquire more inventory of grocery items to resell, but she has limited capital. For this reason, she would like to obtain a loan of PHP 7,000. She will use it to buy more stock of canned goods, snack foods, noodles, laundry soap, beverages, dried fish, seasonings, and soft drinks. She is hoping that she will further improve her business, through this financial assistance.

loans.use: to buy more stock, including canned goods, laundry soap, and dried fish

location.town: Brgy. Sto. Domingo, Bambang, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Rogelio Jr

texts.en:
